alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Marion; Schley; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:46AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marion, northeastern Muscogee, northeastern Chattahoochee, northern Schley, southern Talbot, southwestern Taylor and southeastern Harris Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 645 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Upatoi, or 11 miles southwest of Talbotton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Waverly Hall, Junction City, Geneva, Upatoi, Juniper, Baldwinville, Charing, Baughville, Oakland, Mauk, Box Springs, Howard, Tazewell, Marion Estates and Eelbeck/West Fort Moore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
